name: May's Quest
description:
(This game is "complete" in terms of content, but technically in beta - it is currently going through play-testing.)

Monsters have been spotted near your village! You are called to fight them, and eventually to rescue your brother, who has been kidnapped by a mysterious person.

 Jump, shoot, and tele-dash your way across six stages, collecting money and weapons which will help you on your journey.

This game is the first full-length platformer game that I've completed, and I hope to make many more in the future. If you played this game, feel free to comment and let me know what you thought - it would really make my day :)

Default controls: (configurable with config.jar)

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Z - Jump/Mid-air Dash
  • X - Shoot/Action
  • C - Switch
  • Return - Start

(Note: Currently config.jar support for joystick may not work.)
